.multiline-ellipsis{overflow:hidden;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:2rem;line-height:2;text-overflow:-o-ellipsis-lastline}.post-2line-ellipsis{overflow:hidden;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:2;line-height:1.4;text-overflow:-o-ellipsis-lastline}.post-3line-ellipsis{overflow:hidden;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:3;line-height:1.4;text-overflow:-o-ellipsis-lastline}.subscription{margin:15px 0}.subscription h2{line-height:1;font-size:19px}.subscription .input-group{width:60%;float:left}.subscription .input-group input::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#a6a6a6;font:400 13px "Open Sans",sans-serif}.subscription .input-group input:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#a6a6a6;font:400 13px "Open Sans",sans-serif}.subscription .input-group input::-ms-input-placeholder{color:#a6a6a6;font:400 13px "Open Sans",sans-serif}.subscription .input-group input::placeholder{color:#a6a6a6;font:400 13px "Open Sans",sans-serif}.subscription .input-group.su-agreement{width:auto !important;margin-bottom:10px;margin-right:10px}.subscription button{padding:11px 13px 14px 13px;font:600 13px "Open Sans",sans-serif;width:35%;margin-left:5px}@media (min-width: 768px){.subscription{padding:0}.subscription .input-group{width:258px}.subscription button{width:156px;float:left;margin-left:10px}}@media (min-width: 1600px){.subscription .input-group{width:258px}.subscription button{width:156px;padding:12px}}
